name: Treat Yourself
description:
A very short abstract art game on balancing self-care and treating yourself versus being a productive member of society and getting shit done. 

3 main endings, 1 secret ending

Meant to convey a feeling of unbalance and tiredness.

Music: Rainy Evening - Finval

Controls
WASD - move
after you reach the first ending:
R to restart, Q to quit
